content: I went to school for the first time when I was seven years old. And I keep studying to this day because I still have a lot to learn.
translations: ita:Sono andato a scuola per la prima volta quando avevo sette anni. E continuo a studiare fino ad oggi, perch√© ho ancora mo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
